授業目的: The purpose of the course is for students to learn the principles of English teaching and practice how to effectively make English lessons. You will examine a variety of teaching approaches and utilize them to practice making a lesson plan and conduct a lesson based on their lesson plan.
到達目標:
1. You will become more aware of language teaching principles.
2. You will be familiarized with a variety of language teaching approaches.
3. You will be able to make a lesson plan and conduct a lesson adapting those teaching approaches.
授業方法:
- During the online period: No class on April 16; from April 23, zoom real-time sessions will be conducted at the class time until in-person class is available again. These zoom sessions will be recorded and uploaded on OneDrive. More details will be given via LUNA. You can access the LUNA contents as a "guest" from the link below.
- For the students permitted to take class online during the in-person period: You will participate in the within-class zoom real-time sessions.
